reviews.text:
It is an absolute gem in Kovan! The atmosphere is cozy and welcoming, making it the perfect spot to unwind after a long day.

The drinks menu is impressive, with a great selection of beers and cocktails that pair perfectly with the food.

What truly sets Offshore apart is the exceptional service. The staff are friendly, attentive, and go the extra mile to make you feel at home. Whether you’re dining with friends or family, this place guarantees a memorable experience.

It’s a must-visit for anyone looking for great food, drinks, and a fantastic vibe in Kovan!
A good spot to chill after work, but parking is a challenge. A decent good selection of food and drinks. Quite a good experience to dine outdoor.
Good first visit, food was decent, not really excited to try anything else, but still ok to unwind and have some pub food. Thanks guys.

This is the third time we had dinner here and the taste seems to get better each time. The cockles and oysters were very fresh and there is a Saturday promo where you can order a free item from the kid’s menu when you order a main course. Great place for a dinner and drinks with friends and family.

I love the food! It is always well-prepared and is super tasty. I will always order pizzas and the pork knuckle. Beer buckets are at $35. I tried their cocktails (whisky dry, lychee martini, whisky sour). It was so so so good!! Kudos to the bartender who made us the drinks. Oyster lovers...must order their fresh oysters. You'll love it!!
